title: Boys will be Boys. Or: Dawn of the day of the rise of the planet of the socially awkward, avidly obsessive teenagers of the male gender of the higher socioeconomic classes of the home counties of the united kingdom of Great Britain & Northern Ireland. Part One: in shocking 2-D

sources.title: The Day Will Dawn
sources.description: “Solid wartime entertainment” “An interesting flag-waver” “Rousing wartime film” (IMDB reviews quotes). British propaganda piece and home front morale-booster mostly about the Nazi invasion and occupation of Norway. The history is accurate but the plot is far-fetched. Outstanding cast and excellent production. Good quality print. IMDB rating 6.1. Directed by Harold French. Released in 1942. Complete print. A.K.A. “The Avengers”

metadata.Plot: A racy art short film set in The United Kingdom and follows the unique story telling of socially awkward, avidly obsessive teenagers from socioeconomic classes.
